attributes.action: Give us the right for local residents to be consulted on renaming of Low Moss Prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a proposal to rename Low Moss Prison as HMP Bishopbriggs. This is strongly opposed by local residents. We call upon the PM to support our right under the UK constitution to have a say on such matters and ensure that where there is strong local opinion on such a change of names such as Low Moss, the change does not take place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
